message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer benefits us both in the long run. Think about it!
This is my final offer, Bob.  If you reject this, you'll get less in the next round, and I'm not sure what I'll offer after that.
Alice, this is a fair split. I'm willing to be generous, but I need you to meet me halfway. This is a good deal for both of us considering the time pressure and inflation.
